Introduction.Text: Hello there friend and welcome to Cyber World! It’s a pleasure to meet you!
There's plenty you need to know before we begin.
Are your ready to begin your journey to defeating the phishing foe?

PhishingBasics.Text: Phishing foes are evil people who send phishing emails to other people (targets).
These phishing emails are messages that try to steal something from their intended target or try to get their target to do something.
Falling for these phishing emails is very easy and can have serious consequences.
Therefore, it is very important to be able to recognize these nasty emails and take the right actions to protect against them.

GameInstructions.Text: Your mission is to defend against these phishing foes by recognizing and dealing with their ghastly emails.
To do this, you must find all parts of the email that indicate a phishing attack and respond to it appropriately.
You’ll learn about all the potential indicators and responses as you progress, so don’t worry if you’re not sure about this right away.
I’ll be here to support you and guide you throughout your journey. I believe you can do it!

TrialEncounter.Text: Let’s begin with a simple email for you to start with.
I’ll walk you through it step-by-step.
One key indicator of a phishing attack is spelling mistakes. Keep your eyes peeled for these.
First, you need to identify the indicators of the phishing email.
To do this, simply press anywhere on the email to select the part you think is suspicious.
Once done, press the ‘confirm’ button to continue.
Good job! Secondly, you must respond to the email by selecting any of the available response options underneath the email.
Nice work! You're getting the hang of it!
At the end of each of these encounters, you will be given feedback on where you were right and where you went wrong.
It's good to make mistakes, so don’t worry if this happens. It means you're learning!
